prompt: Generate diverse and realistic customer feedback text that expresses negative sentiment. The feedback should convey dissatisfaction, frustration, or disappointment with a product, service, or experience. Include a wide range of contexts such as online shopping, restaurant visits, customer support interactions, app usage, travel experiences, or subscription services. Use varied tones (e.g., angry, sarcastic, disappointed, formal, passive-aggressive) and lengths (from short complaints to detailed critical reviews). Incorporate different perspectives, such as feedback from younger or older customers, or from different cultural backgrounds. Include subtle or nuanced negativity (e.g., mild frustration or polite criticism) alongside strong complaints. Examples could include criticism of poor quality, delays, unhelpful staff, technical issues, misleading advertising, or unpleasant experiences.
response:
I ordered a dress two weeks ago, and it still hasn't arrived. This is unacceptable.

The food at the restaurant was cold and tasted stale. Not worth the price we paid.

I tried to reach customer service, but I was put on hold for over an hour. Completely frustrating experience.

The app keeps crashing, and I can’t even use it. What a waste of time!

I was really disappointed with the quality of the shoes. They fell apart after just one week.

My subscription was charged without my consent, and now I can’t get a refund. This is ridiculous!

The staff at the hotel were unhelpful and rude. I expected much better service.

I thought I was getting a great deal, but the product was totally misleading. Very disappointed.

The flight was delayed without any explanation, and we missed our connecting flight. Totally unacceptable!

I ordered a pizza that arrived an hour late and was cold. Never ordering from here again.

I had high hopes for this online course, but the content was outdated and poorly organized.

The waiter ignored us for most of the night, and when we finally got our food, it was incorrect.

The quality of the fabric in this shirt is awful. I expected better from this brand.

I can't believe how long it took to get a response from customer support. This is not how you treat customers.

The movie was advertised as a comedy, but it was more like a boring drama. What a letdown!

I received the wrong item in my order, and getting it fixed has been a hassle.

I was charged twice for my meal, and the manager was no help at all.

The checkout process on your website is a nightmare. I almost gave up!

The tour guide was disorganized and seemed uninterested in the group. Very disappointing.

I bought a new phone, and it keeps freezing. I regret this purchase.

I tried to cancel my subscription but couldn't find a way to do it online. Very frustrating!

The service at the restaurant was incredibly slow, and the staff seemed overwhelmed.

I received a damaged item and was told it would be replaced, but it never was.

The online class had terrible audio quality. I couldn't hear anything clearly.

The bed at the hotel was uncomfortable, and I didn’t sleep well at all.

I was promised next-day delivery, but my package arrived a week late. Very misleading!

I expected more from the product based on the reviews, but it just doesn't deliver.

The customer service representative was dismissive and didn’t solve my issue.

I ordered a coffee, and it tasted burnt. I couldn’t even finish it.

The promotion was confusing, and I ended up paying full price. Not happy about it!

The app's user interface is not intuitive at all. I gave up trying to navigate it.

I booked a trip based on the pictures online, but the reality was far from what was advertised.

The quality of the linens at the hotel was subpar. They felt scratchy and uncomfortable.

I was promised a refund within three days, but it’s been two weeks with no update.

I found the restaurant’s atmosphere to be loud and chaotic. Not what I expected for a nice dinner.

The shoes I bought were uncomfortable, and I can't return them because I wore them once.

The online support chat was useless; I didn’t get any answers to my questions.

The furniture I ordered was missing parts and took forever to arrive.

I was really looking forward to this event, but it was poorly organized and ran late.

The app frequently crashes, making it impossible to use effectively.

I had a terrible experience at the car rental place; they charged me for damage that wasn’t my fault.

I received misleading information about the product's features. Very disappointing!

I had to wait over an hour for my food at the restaurant, and it wasn't even busy.

The hotel staff were not friendly, which made my stay less enjoyable.

The product broke within days of use, and I feel like I wasted my money.
